intro: Dunalia obovata, commonly known as the broad-ovate dunalia, is a flowering plant native to parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Leguminosae, also known as the legume or bean family. The plant is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves and yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. It is often found in moist, shaded areas such as forests and stream banks. Dunalia obovata is valued for its ornamental appeal and has been used in traditional medicine in some regions.
